title: The Stowaways
description: Though still a young pegasus, Jay has endured more trauma than any should in a lifetime - the accident that crippled her wings left her depressed and brokenhearted - and every day the mare's mind wanders back to the time before ... everything.After a long year, Jay is finally reunited with her beloved friends on the beautiful beaches of Hastila. The winged mare is not only excited to catch up with Ara, Sandy, and Finney, but she has a huge secret to share with them - she's eleven months pregnant!The joy is not to last. During the night, Jay's beloved brother Wren is stolen by a crew of Neorian pirates! The flight across the ocean to rescue him is tiring, and Raven, Jay’s mate, isn’t making the situation any better with his constant complaining and arrogance. To make matters worse, Finney seems to be keeping secrets from them, and Jay is coming closer and closer to her due date than she realizes. In this exciting sequel to The Drought, you will be submerged in the thrill of Jay’s terrifying adventure!
author: Emory R. Ivie
